name: Sudoku Blocks: Brain Puzzles
description:
Sudoku Blocks is mixture of block puzzle games and sudoku. Move various shaped blocks onto the 9x9 grid, the aim of the game is to keep the board clear by making complete lines (rows or columns) or 3x3 sudoku boxes.

A simple but challenging new puzzle game - try to beat your high score!

Features:
- Move various shaped blocks onto the 9x9 board.
- Keep the board clear by making lines or boxes.
- Match several items at once to get a combo.
- Beat your high score!
- Fun for the whole family - kids, teens and adults, girls and boys!

Download now but don't get too addicted!
